titleStmt.title: The replie of Iohn Darrell, to the answer of Iohn Deacon, and Iohn Walker, concerning the doctrine of the possession and dispossession of demoniakes
titleStmt.author: Darrel, John, b. ca. 1562.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Deacon, John and Walker, John. A summarie answere to al the material points in any of Master Darel his bookes.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
